definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: beat, knock (Ar. dafaqa pour out, also drive (beasts))—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Perf. 3 mpl. sf. [[וּדְפָקוּם]] consec. Ge 33:13, but rd. 1 s. sf. [[וּדְפַקְתִּים]] LXX SyrVer Sam Di beat (in driving, drive severely or cruelly); Pt. [[דּוֹפֵק]] Ct So 5:2 abs. knocking (at door).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מִתְדַּפְּקִים עַל־הַדָָּלֶת]] Ju Jdg 19:22 beat violently (beat themselves tired) against the door.
